name: Tobias Heintz
body:
# Tobias Heintz
## Technology consultant & developer

I am a self-motivated technology leader with 10+ years of experience in the industry. I drive digital transformation and help companies strengthen their digital foothold.


* cloud computing: AWS, Azure, GCP, serverless, planet-scale, cloud native, IaC, PaaS, IaaS, Terraform, Docker
* data engineering: Kubernetes, Mesos, Hadoop, Kafka, cluster computing, HDFS, Cassandra, Redis, MySQL
* web applications: Python, PHP, Java, Go, HTML, Javascript, React, Apache, nginx, API, web security
* development methodologies: DevOps, GitOps, CI/CD, Gitlab, Jenkins, mobile first, Microservices, TDD
* management skills: team building, project mgmt, product development, communication, jack of all trades

Sound good?
tobias@positiveinfinity.net
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
